postData.contentHtml:
I have taught following courses at Augusta University.

Semester Course title (enrollment)
2021 FA CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I (21) Syllabus
2021 SU CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I (15) Syllabus
2021 SP1 CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I (54) Syllabus
2020 FA CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I (29) Syllabus
2020 SP CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I (56) Syllabus
2019 FA CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I (53) Syllabus
2019 SU CSCI 1200 - Introduction to Computers and Programming (7) Syllabus
2019 SP CSCI 1200 - Introduction to Computers and Programming (17) Syllabus

Catalog Descriptions

  • CSCI 1301 - Principles of Computer Programming I
  • CSCI 1200 - Introduction to Computers and Programming

Projects

In 2021 I also participated in CSCI 1301 course resources transformation project. These resources are now shared between course sections, free to access and open source.

Footnotes

  1. Co-teaching assignment â†©
